Metadata.Title: the great muffin scheme
Metadata.Description: The Muffin Gang, also known as the Muffineers, aren’t all they appear to be.Helen West, the cook, has been poisoning the muffins. James Burton is the head of the operation, while Lissy Arlington and Herbert West pose as the dealers giving out poisoned muffins. The Black man is the brains behind the entire scheme.Take them down—quickly and silently, good luck 47.
